nodes.text: The Blue Stars were an organization that in 3 BBY was present along with representatives from the Galactic Empire and Droid Gotra at an auction in Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica held by Cli Pastayra of the Wandering Star for a device known as the Phylanx Redux Transmitter.
The name "Blue Stars" is a reference to a bootleg Star Wars figure released as part of a Turkish toy line known as Uzay.
